entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 11 March 2023
